text: Hugo Eduardo Villaverde (27 January 1954 â€“ November 2024) was an Argentine football defender. He made six appearances for the Argentina national football team in 1979. Villaverde died in November 2024 at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Santa Fe, Argentina Category:Argentine footballers
